method.name: RequestShutdown
method.tp:docstring: The |reason| arg is a power_manager::RequestShutdownReason value. The |description| arg is a human-readable string describing the reason for the request; it is logged by powerd.

method.name: RequestRestart
method.tp:docstring: The |reason| arg is a power_manager::RequestRestartReason value. The |description| arg is a human-readable string describing the reason for the request; it is logged by powerd.

method.name: ChangeWifiRegDomain
method.tp:docstring: The |domain| arg is a power_manager::WifiRegDomainDbus value. Change the WiFi regdomain.

method.name: RequestSuspend
method.tp:docstring: The |external_wakeup_count| arg is optional, and it will call two different methods in the backend. This can't be expressed in the DBus Introspection XML file.
The |wakeup_timeout| arg is optional. It specifies a timeout after which the system should resume. Supply 0 for no timeout.
The |suspend_flavor| arg is optional. It specifies the type of suspend to perform. See enum RequestSuspendFlavor for values. Not specifying a value is equivalent to 0, REQUEST_SUSPEND_DEFAULT.

method.name: SetScreenBrightness
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SetBacklightBrightnessRequest protobuf.

method.name: ToggleKeyboardBacklight
method.tp:docstring:
Toggle the on/off state of the keyboard backlight.
If the keyboard's backlight is currently turned on, it will be disabled, and vice versa.

method.name: SetKeyboardBrightness
method.tp:docstring:
Set the brightness of the keyboard backlight.
The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SetBacklightBrightnessRequest protobuf.

method.name: GetKeyboardBrightnessPercent
method.tp:docstring:
Get the current brightness of the keyboard backlight as a percentage.
If |success| is true, the returned value |percent| will be a value between 0.0 and 100.0 inclusive, representing the brightness. The value 0.0 represents "off", while 100.0 represents "full brightness".

method.name: GetPowerSupplyProperties
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::PowerSupplyProperties protobuf.

method.name: GetBatteryState
method.tp:docstring: The |external_power_type| arg is a native enum: power_manager::system::ExternalPowerType. The |battery_state| arg is an enum created to be compatible with the upower battery state enum: power_manager::system::UpowerBatteryState.

method.name: HandleUserActivity
method.tp:docstring: The |type| arg is a power_manager::UserActivityType.

method.name: SetPolicy
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::PowerManagementPolicy protobuf.

method.name: HandlePowerButtonAcknowledgment
method.tp:docstring: The |timestamp_internal| arg is represented as the return value of (|timestamp| - base::TimeTicks()).InMicroseconds().

method.name: IgnoreNextPowerButtonPress
method.tp:docstring: The |timeout_internal| arg is represented as the return value of base::TimeDelta::InMicroseconds(). Setting it to 0 cancels a previously set period.

method.name: RegisterSuspendDelay
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_request_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::RegisterSuspendDelayRequest protobuf. The |serialized_reply_proto| arg is a serialized RegisterSuspendDelayReply protobuf.

method.name: UnregisterSuspendDelay
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::UnregisterSuspendDelayRequest protobuf.

method.name: HandleSuspendReadiness
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SuspendReadinessInfo protobuf.

method.name: RegisterDarkSuspendDelay
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_request_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::RegisterSuspendDelayRequest protobuf. The |serialized_reply_proto| arg is a serialized RegisterSuspendDelayReply protobuf.

method.name: UnregisterDarkSuspendDelay
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::UnregisterSuspendDelayRequest protobuf.

method.name: HandleDarkSuspendReadiness
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SuspendReadinessInfo protobuf.

method.name: RecordDarkResumeWakeReason
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::DarkResumeWakeReason protobuf.

method.name: GetInactivityDelays
method.tp:docstring: |serialized_reply_proto| is a serialized power_manager::PowerManagementPolicy::Delays protobuf describing the current inactivity delays.

method.name: GetThermalState
method.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::ThermalEvent protobuf.

method.name: ChargeNowForAdaptiveCharging
method.tp:docstring: Stop delaying charging for Adaptive Charging for this charge session.

method.name: GetChargeHistory
method.tp:docstring: Fetches the charge history for up to the last 30 days. |serialized_proto| is a serialized power_manager::ChargeHistory protobuf.

method.name: GetBatterySaverModeState
method.tp:docstring: Get the current state of Battery Saver Mode. The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized |power_manager::BatterySaverModeState| protobuf.

method.name: SetBatterySaverModeState
method.tp:docstring: Update the state of Battery Saver Mode. The |serialized_proto| is a serialized |power_manager::SetBatterySaverModeStateRequest| protobuf.

signal.name: BatterySaverModeStateChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Called when the state of Battery Saver Mode has changed, and on powerd startup. The |serialized_proto| is a serialized |power_manager::BatterySaverModeState| protobuf.

signal.name: PeripheralBatteryStatus
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::PeripheralBatteryStatus protobuf.

signal.name: PowerSupplyPoll
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::PowerSupplyProperties protobuf.

method.name: BatteryStatePoll
method.tp:docstring: The |external_power_type| arg is a native enum: power_manager::system::ExternalPowerType. The |battery_state| arg is an enum created to be compatible with the upower battery state enum: power_manager::system::UpowerBatteryState.

signal.name: SuspendImminent
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SuspendImminent protobuf.

signal.name: SuspendDone
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SuspendDone protobuf.

signal.name: DarkSuspendImminent
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::SuspendImminent protobuf.

signal.name: HibernateResumeReady
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::HibernateResumeReady protobuf.

signal.name: InputEvent
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::InputEvent protobuf.

signal.name: IdleActionImminent
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::IdleActionImminent protobuf.

signal.name: ScreenIdleStateChanged
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::ScreenIdleState protobuf describing the current idle-related state of the display.

signal.name: InactivityDelaysChanged
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::PowerManagementPolicy::Delays protobuf describing the current inactivity delays.

signal.name: AmbientColorTemperatureChanged
signal.tp:docstring: |color_temp| describes the correlated color temperature of the current ambient light conditions.

signal.name: ThermalEvent
signal.tp:docstring: The |serialized_proto| arg is a serialized power_manager::ThermalEvent protobuf.
